content.text: Service this Sunday at 10 AM. We're continuing our series on the book of Romans.
Coffee and tea will be available starting at 9:30.
Heads up - we're expecting heavy snow this weekend. If you need help getting to church or would rather stay home, no worries at all.
Stay safe out there.
The youth room is closed temporarily due to a ceiling leak. We're working on getting it fixed as soon as possible.
Youth group will meet in the fellowship hall this week.
Potluck next Sunday after service. Bring your favorite dish to share.
We'll have tables set up outside if the weather holds.
The parking lot will be closed Saturday morning for repaving. Should be done by noon.
Really grateful for everyone who came out to the potluck. Great food and even better conversations.
The new stained glass window in the sanctuary is finally complete. Stop by sometime this week if you want to see it before Sunday.
Thanks to everyone who donated to make this happen.
Quick reminder that service is at 10 AM, not 10:30, for the next few weeks. We'll go back to our normal schedule in December.
Looking for 2-3 volunteers to help with childcare this Sunday. Just need to be available from 10-11:30 AM.
Let me know if you can help out.
The church calendar for November is posted on the bulletin board. Check it out if you want to see what's coming up.
Can we do Thursday night this week instead of Wednesday? My work schedule changed.
I'll bring dessert this week. Any dietary restrictions I should know about?
We're doing a meal train for the Johnsons next week. They just had their baby. I set up a sign-up sheet if anyone wants to help.
Just need simple dinners, nothing fancy.
Should we finish Ephesians or start something new? I'm good either way but wanted to check with everyone.
We're out of town this weekend but should be back for next week. Have a good meeting without us!
Really good discussion last week. I've been thinking about what we talked about all week.
Can we pray for my mom? She's having surgery next Tuesday. Nothing too serious but I'd appreciate it.
We're on Book 2, Chapter 3 this week. I'm finding this section really challenging to get through. Lewis packs so much into every paragraph.
Anyone else feel like they need to read each chapter twice?
Here's the reading schedule for the next month. We're doing about one chapter per week.
I have a question about the section on pride. Lewis says pride is the worst sin, but I'm not sure I follow his argument. Can we talk about this when we meet?
Reminder that we're meeting at Emma's place this week, not the church. Same time though.
I found this article that talks about Lewis's view on morality. Thought it might be helpful for our discussion.
I can send the link if anyone wants it.
I'm falling behind on the reading. Is anyone else having trouble keeping up?
The discussion about Christian behavior in Book 3 is so relevant to today. I'm taking lots of notes.
What did everyone think about the chapter on forgiveness? That was a tough one for me.
Can't make it this week - I have a family thing. See you all next time.
Thanks for leading the discussion last week, Sarah. You had some really insightful points.
We finished the walkway project this weekend. Came out better than expected.
Thanks to everyone who helped out. Couldn't have done it without you.
The lawn needs mowing before Sunday. I can do it Saturday morning if no one else can.
Work party this Saturday at 9 AM. We're tackling the overgrown area behind the parking lot.
Bring work gloves and water. We'll have tools and snacks.
Great turnout at the work party. We got way more done than I expected.
The sprinkler system needs repairs. Zone 3 isn't working at all. I'll take a look at it this week.
Someone left the back gate open last night. Please make sure it's closed and latched when you leave.
We need to order mulch for the garden beds. I'm thinking 15 bags should do it. I can pick it up if someone wants to help me spread it.
The basement floor project is almost done. Just need to do the final sealing coat.
Should be ready to use by next week.
I found a crack in the parking lot that's getting worse. We should probably get it filled before winter.
The gutters need cleaning before the rainy season really hits. I can do it next weekend if someone has a ladder I can borrow.
I trimmed the bushes by the entrance. Let me know if you think they need more work.
We need volunteers for coffee setup this Sunday. Just need someone to arrive at 9:15 to get things started.
Let me know if you can help.
Someone donated a new espresso machine! It's way nicer than our old one. Stop by after service to check it out.
We're low on oat milk. I'll pick some up before Sunday.
The coffee bar schedule for November is up. Check the calendar to see when you're signed up.
Quick tip - if you're making a latte, make sure to steam the milk to 150 degrees. Any hotter and it starts to taste burnt.
Can someone cover for me next Sunday? I'll be out of town.
The grinder is acting up again. Might need to take it apart and clean it.
Here's a photo from last week. The new setup is working great.
Oyster Dome hike this Saturday. Meeting at the church at 7 AM.
It's about 6 miles round trip with some steep sections. Bring water and snacks.
The hike was great. Perfect weather and amazing views from the top.
I'm thinking Chain Lakes next month. It's a bit longer but worth it for the fall colors.
Chain Lakes was incredible. The fall colors were even better than I expected.
We had 8 guys show up. Great conversations on the way up.
Can't make it this weekend. Have a family thing. See you on the next one.
Should we do an easier hike next time? I know some guys who want to join but aren't up for the steep ones yet.
I'm in for whatever hike is next. Just let me know when and where.
Thanks for leading these hikes, James. It's been a great way to connect with other guys from church.
The new soundboard is all set up. We did a test run yesterday and everything sounds great.
I'll do a quick training session this Saturday at 2 PM for anyone who wants to learn the new system.
I can run sound this Sunday but need someone to cover slides. Anyone available?
The worship team got a new keyboard. I'll need to adjust the mix this Sunday.
Can someone show me how to set up the microphones? I'm still not sure I'm doing it right.
The slides schedule for December is posted. Let me know if you need to swap with anyone.
I'm out of town the first week of December. Can someone cover for me?
I'll bring a salad!
I can bring some grilled chicken.
I can help out. Put me down for childcare.
Thursday works for us. Same time?
Yes, same time works. Thanks!
Sarah is gluten-free, just FYI.
I can do Tuesday. I'll make lasagna.
I'll take Wednesday.
I'd like to finish Ephesians. We're so close.
Same here. Let's finish it.
Absolutely. We'll be praying for her.
Praying for a smooth surgery and quick recovery.
Yeah, I definitely read it twice sometimes!
That's a good question. Let's definitely discuss it.
Yes! Send it over, I'd love to read it.
Don't worry about it. We can slow down if needed.
It really hit me hard too. Lots to think about.
Same. That was probably my favorite chapter so far.
I can edge if you mow. Just let me know what time you're thinking.
8 AM work for you?
I'll be there. What time?
Count me in too.
9 AM. Thanks!
That looks amazing! Great work everyone.
I can help with the mulch. When are you thinking?
Saturday morning work?
I'll bring my extension ladder. Should work.
I can do it this week. Do we need to buy more beans or are we good?
We should be good on beans. Thanks!
This is so nice! Can't wait to try it.
Wow, that's a huge upgrade!
I'll cover for you. No problem.
Thanks! I owe you one.
I'm in for the hike!
Count me in too.
I'll be there.
Those views are incredible!
This looks amazing. Wish I could have made it.
Good idea. Maybe something around Lake Padden?
Perfect. That would be a good one to start with.
Thanks for setting this up, Mike. The new board is a huge improvement.
I'll do slides. No problem.
Thanks Ben!
I'll be there early on Sunday. I can walk you through it.
That would be great. Thank you!
I can cover. I was planning to be there anyway.
